document_data.name: ''Helmet of Teleportation''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''helmet of teleportation''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[helmet]] capable of magically transporting its wearer.
document_data.Description: These items appeared in many forms just like mundane helmets.
document_data.Powers: These helms granted the wearer the ability to ''[[teleport]]'' once per day to a known destination. A [[wizard]] wearing a ''helm of teleportation'' who had the ''teleport'' [[spell]] memorized could ''teleport'' six times per day.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Sememmon]], the ruler of [[Darkhold]], wore a ''helm of teleportation''.
